body: I see, the reason is indices returned from `_unique_dim()` is not contiguous. In that case, maybe you can `indices = indices.contiguous()`
body_html: I see, the reason is indices returned from _unique_dim() is not contiguous. In that case, maybe you can indices = indices.contiguous()
body_text: I see, the reason is indices returned from _unique_dim() is not contiguous. In that case, maybe you can indices = indices.contiguous()
